header.description: Single transaction acknowledgment record with payment and customer details

rows.description: No repeating rows - this is a single-page receipt

semantics: All tokens are pass-through or constant values. No filtering parameters required as this displays a single transaction confirmation.
transformations: Format payment_date as YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS for timestamp field
Format payment_date as DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS for transaction_date_time field
Format total_amount as currency with rupee symbol and 2 decimal places
All branding and static text fields populated as literal constants
